document_data.mainbody:
Bormton was a village in Amn, lying between Trademeet and the Small Teeth mountains.
Revered Brother Filithan of the Church of Ilmater originally hailed from Bormton. He was involved in the enchantment of the legendary sword Dornavver in the Year of the Wrath Sword, 275 DR.
In the first days of Marpenoth of the Year of the Bright Blade, 1347 DR, Bormton was burned and razed by people from Tethyr because they heard a rumor that the village took in some refugees who had escaped the carnage during the Ten Black Days of Eleint.
In 1374 DR, this village was noted as still being in ruins.
